text: Robert Frank "Bob" List (born September 1, 1936) is an American attorney and politician. He served as the 24th Governor of Nevada from 1979 to 1983. List was defeated for re-election in 1982 by Nevada Attorney General Richard Bryan. He is a member of the Republican Party. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Nevada Category:Politicians from California Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Robert List
